name: Aida's Victoriana Inn

reviews.text: Any problems we had with the inn were overshadowed by the delightful Aida.
reviews.title: The best part of the inn was Aida

reviews.text: A coat of fresh paint throughout would be nice, as would some reading light in the bed.
reviews.title: Perfect View!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was perfect with any individual preferences noted.
reviews.title: Wonderful Trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We never did get wine as others did, but we bought our own.
reviews.title: Great location . Lovely house. Nice outdoors

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can't stress enough how accommodating the owners were, but in all honesty, a little paint would improve appearances.
reviews.title: Good, but could be better...

description: 1865 Home on the historic Harbor of St. Michaels. An acre of land within walking distance to most of the attractions.Six rooms and one Jr. Suite, all private baths, some waterview, fireplace, twin, queen & king rooms. Full hot breakfast and complimentary snacks. Friday Evening innkeepers reception for guest. One pet friendly room. Free Wifi throughout property and complimentary on site parking.
